DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to read all the threat indicators for your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.

Application.description: Allows the app to read all the threat indicators for your organization, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns

DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete) on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.longDescription: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns

Application.description: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any threat indicators it does not own.
Application.longDescription: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns
